## Checklist

### Before Starting
- [ ] Checked ACTIVE_SESSIONS.md for conflicts
- [ ] Created session file from template
- [ ] Created feature branch
- [ ] Updated MASTER_ROADMAP.md (marked `[~]`)
- [ ] Committed status update to GitHub

### During Work
- [ ] Update progress every 30 min
- [ ] Commit status updates to GitHub
- [ ] Run tests after each major change
- [ ] Follow all DEVELOPMENT_PROTOCOLS.md rules

### Before Completing
- [ ] All tests pass (100%)
- [ ] Zero TypeScript errors
- [ ] All code production-ready
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Deployment verified

### After Completing
- [ ] Updated MASTER_ROADMAP.md (marked `[x]`)
- [ ] Moved session file to completed/
- [ ] Committed final status to GitHub
- [ ] Provided review instructions
- [ ] Ready for merge approval
